summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SunoLegal website updates. All requested features successfully implemented and working correctly.
passed_tests: Hero image shows Indian professional woman (Unsplash image)
Find Lawyer page displays Indian lawyer photos for all 4 lawyers
Footer has only ONE Contact Us link in Company section (no duplicate in Quick Links)
Footer Follow Us section with LinkedIn and WhatsApp icons present
LinkedIn icon opens in new tab with correct URL
WhatsApp icon opens in new tab with correct URL
For Lawyers button visible and clickable in top navigation header
Privacy page shows January 2026 for last updated date
Footer Lawyers button has green styling (border-green-600 bg-green-900/30)
Social icons have hover animation with scale and color transitions
All navigation buttons are clickable and functional
